# Progress Made on Recommendations from WPDCS20

During the 20^th^ session of the WPDCS, five recommendations were submitted to the SC, categorized under several themes, in addition to the recommendations included in the Programme of Work and the final report of the meeting. The progress made on these recommendations is further reviewed, and, where appropriate, alternative recommendations are proposed for participants to consider and endorse. The progress on each recommendation is presented in [Appendix III](#RecProgress).
